mapper.insert: insert into comments(comments_id, personal_no, comments_content, comments_writer) values (#{commentsId}, #{personalNo}, #{commentsContent}, #{commentsWriter})
mapper.select: select * from comments order by comments_id asc
mapper.update: update comments set commnets_content = #{commentsContent}, comments_writer = #{commentsWriter}, where comments_id = #{commentsId}
